    import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, Inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { BrowserModule } from '@angular/platform-browser'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit{ title = 'The Dating App'; public users: AppUsers[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') private baseUrl: string) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getUsers(); } getUsers() { this.http.get('https://localhost:7023/api/users').subscribe(result => { this.users = result; }, error => console.log(error)); } } interface AppUsers { id: number; username: string; passwordHash: Blob; passwordSalt: Blob; }
